Uses of Class
com.ikalagaming.item.ItemStack

  • Packages that use ItemStack 
    Package Description
    com.ikalagaming.entity  
    com.ikalagaming.entity.component  
    com.ikalagaming.item  

    • Uses of ItemStack in com.ikalagaming.entity

      Methods in com.ikalagaming.entity that return ItemStack 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ItemStack InventorySlot.combineItemStacks(ItemStack toAdd)
      Try to combine this item stack with another.
      ItemStack InventorySlot.getItemStack()
      Returns the pointer to the ItemStack object.
      ItemStack InventorySlot.setEmpty()
      Sets the current stack to nothing and returns the old stack if it exists.
      ItemStack InventorySlot.setItemStack(ItemStack newStack)
      Sets the ItemStack to the specified ItemStack and returns the old stack.
      ItemStack InventorySlot.takeItems(int count)
      Tries to take the requested amount of items from the stack and return it in a new stack.
      Methods in com.ikalagaming.entity with parameters of type ItemStack 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean InventorySlot.canMergeWith(ItemStack other)
      Returns true if the other stack can stack with this item type, and this stack has enough space to accommodate the other stack.
      ItemStack InventorySlot.combineItemStacks(ItemStack toAdd)
      Try to combine this item stack with another.
      ItemStack InventorySlot.setItemStack(ItemStack newStack)
      Sets the ItemStack to the specified ItemStack and returns the old stack.

    • Uses of ItemStack in com.ikalagaming.entity.component

      Methods in com.ikalagaming.entity.component with parameters of type ItemStack 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Inventory.addItemStack(ItemStack items)
      Combines the ItemStack with the first available stack, if possible.

    • Uses of ItemStack in com.ikalagaming.item

      Methods in com.ikalagaming.item that return ItemStack 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ItemStack ItemStack.addItems(int count)
      Adds the specified amount of the items to the stack.
      ItemStack ItemStack.clone()
      Returns a new ItemStack with the same item and size as this one.
      static ItemStack ItemStack.getEmptyStack()
      Creates and returns a new stack with null item and 0 item count.
      ItemStack ItemStack.removeItems(int count)
      Removes the specified amount of the items to the stack.
      ItemStack ItemStack.setAmount(int amount)
      Sets the stack size to the given amount.
